indications: Indications see under Dose below; anaerobic infections, section 5.1.11
name: TINIDAZOLE - AMOEBICIDES
doses: Intestinal amoebiasis, 2 g daily for 2–3 days; child 50–60 mg/kg daily for 3 days
Amoebic involvement of liver, 1.5–2 g daily for 3–6 days; child 50–60 mg/kg daily for 5 days

Urogenital trichomoniasis and giardiasis, single 2 g dose; child single dose of 50–75 mg/kg (repeated once if
necessary)
